column1: We study the tensor product of the {\it higher spin
representations} (see the definition in Sect. 2.2) of the elliptic
quantum group $\E$.  The  transfer matrices associated  with the
$\E$-module are exactly diagonalized  by the nested Bethe ansatz
method. Some special cases of the construction give the exact solution
for the $\Zb_n$ Belavin model and for the elliptic $A_{n-1}$
We study the tensor product of the {\it higher spin
representations} (see the definition in Sect. 2.2) of the elliptic
quantum group $\E$.  The  transfer matrices associated  with the
$\E$-module are exactly diagonalized  by the nested Bethe ansatz
method. Some special cases of the construction give the exact solution
for the $\Zb_n$ Belavin model and for the elliptic $A_{n-1}$
